answers.answer: Yes. I am constantly thirsty. I cant leave the house without a drink in my hand. And my mouth stays dry alot too.
OMG yes! I am constantly thirsty like I haven't drank anything all day. It's so annoying
A typical woman needs a gallon of water a day to stay hydrated during pregnancy. If you are drinking that and still thirsty, talk to your doctor. It can be a sign of gestational diabetes.
I am this time round this is my second pregnancy
There has to be a difference between being thirsty and having a dry mouth, right? My mouth is always dry but am not thirsty...weird.
Thanks ladies! It seems like I can never get enough to drink! So annyoing!
OMG yes!!! And it is so annoying.
Yep, hospital says I should drink a gallon of water per day.
Yes! All the time, need a water bottle with me at all times.

All the time...and I don't usually drink milk but that's what I crave yet it doesn't quench my thirst...but yet I am constantly parched....my lips are so dry too that I worry thst I'm not drinking enough but I drink all day long and even at night I have a giant bottle of water next to the bed!
Im always thirsty since getting to 26 weeks all i want to do is drink im not hungery just thirsty i have to force myself to eat as every time i look at food i dont want it
I'm the same never hungry just always thirsty if I do eat it's ice or juicy fruit like melon

Yes! Definitely all the time. I drink way more then a gallon a day. Y tummy will be so full and I'll still be so thirsty. I feel like I hurt from drinking to much but I'm always drinking something and eating ice like crazy

question: Are there any moms who always feel thirsty??
title: Always Thirsty
